description: To find young dudes for my little, evil project is sometimes easier then you would think. Since I placed my ad again last week in something like the local yellow pages, I got again so many emails and calls. So once again I left it to fate to decide and just picked random email. I was nicely surprised that my pick didn´t live that far away. When I got to his place he had 2 friends over. For a minute I´ve had a very kinky thought. To fuck all of them. I know that my colleague Honza from Czechhunter has been doing that before. But it was too risky and I didn´t want to loose the one I already had. As soon as he saw money, I saw it in his eyes. He will be down to suck and fuck. He kinda reminded me Harry Potter. So I pulled out my magic stick...
title: Debt Dandy 78
